notes.text: An updated webkit2gtk3 package that adds one enhancement is now available for Red Hat Enterprise Linux 8.
notes.title: Topic

notes.text:
This update adds the following enhancement:

* Update WebKitGTK to 2.24.4 (BZ#1755824).

Users of webkit2gtk3 are advised to upgrade to this updated package, which adds this enhancement.
notes.title: Details

notes.title: Terms of Use

publisher.issuing_authority: Red Hat Product Security is responsible for vulnerability handling across all Red Hat offerings.
publisher.name: Red Hat Product Security

document.title: Red Hat Enhancement Advisory: webkit2gtk3 enhancement update

notes.text: Multiple memory corruption issues were addressed with improved memory handling. This issue is fixed in iOS 12.4, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, tvOS 12.4, Safari 12.1.2, iTunes for Windows 12.9.6, iCloud for Windows 7.13, iCloud for Windows 10.6. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to arbitrary code execution.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: webkitgtk: Multiple memory corruption issues leading to arbitrary code execution
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability

remediations.details:
Before applying this update, make sure all previously released errata
relevant to your system have been applied.

For details on how to apply this update, refer to:

https://access.redhat.com/articles/11258

vulnerabilities.title: webkitgtk: Multiple memory corruption issues leading to arbitrary code execution

notes.text: A logic issue existed in the handling of synchronous page loads. This issue was addressed with improved state management. This issue is fixed in iOS 12.4, macOS Mojave 10.14.6, tvOS 12.4, Safari 12.1.2, iTunes for Windows 12.9.6, iCloud for Windows 7.13, iCloud for Windows 10.6. Processing maliciously crafted web content may lead to universal cross site scripting.
notes.title: Vulnerability description

notes.text: webkitgtk: Incorrect state management leading to universal cross-site scripting
notes.title: Vulnerability summary

notes.text: The CVSS score(s) listed for this vulnerability do not reflect the associated product's status, and are included for informational purposes to better understand the severity of this vulnerability.
notes.title: CVSS score applicability
